column4: That's pretty wierd. It's possible that there is a mask mismatch, or the the router/modem simply needs to be cold booted. Did you try a restart on the modem?

I've tried yes. The thing this only happens sometimes. In windows xp I just hit repair network connection and it starts working. On ubuntu... normally after a couple of reboots of my modem and laptop I get it to work
if I run ifconfig I see that all my received packets are dropped. Could this be some bug in the driver?
